page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: PRE-SCHOOL (a) Mother & Toddler. This group meets on Wednesdays from 2.00p.m. until 4.00p.m. in the Village Hall. While the mothers have a chance to chat, the toddlers play with toys and on equipment. In the summer they go outside and in addition use a paddling pool. (b) Play Group. Play Group caters for children from 2 to 5 years of age in the Village Hall on Mondays, Tuesdays, and Fridays from 9.00a.m. until noon. They are supervised by a qualified leader aided by a few mothers using equipment, craft, and painting materials.
